title: Tata Curvv EV launching tomorrow. Here's what we know so far about it
description: Tata Motors is launching the Curvv SUV coup√© tomorrow. Teasers showed design elements. Priced above Nexon EV, it has a 400-500 km range, dual-motor AWD, 12.3-inch infotainment, six airbags, and a 360-degree camera. Following the Tiago EV, Punch EV, and Tigor EV, ICE models will later enhance Tata's lineup.
